title: token
description: A token used to interact with the API

version.description: The version number of this JSON schema

_id.description: The ID associated with this object

token.description: The token that will be used to interact with the API

expires_on.description: The date when the token is supposed to expire

username.description: The user name associated with the token

email.description: The email address associated with the token

ip_address.description: List of IP addresses the token is restricted to

properties.description: An array of length 16 of integer values; each value defines a properties of the token
